earned.name: Special Movement

earned.name: First Timer
earned.desc: I'll never forget my first time for Ryu's sake! Win one Ranked Match! Gotta aim for the top!

unearned.name: Trophy Collector
unearned.desc: Attain all Trophies! The path of the warrior demands this from those who walk on it!

unearned.name: Fashion Plate
unearned.desc: Even a top rate fighter needs to coordinate properly! You gotta get all of the Colors first!

unearned.name: Dan the Man
unearned.desc: Mastery of the Saikyo arts requires mastery of the Personal Action! Collect 'em all, punk!

unearned.name: Entitled
unearned.desc: A Title does not tell all of a man, sir, but if I were to see one Title, I'd want them all...

unearned.name: Iconoclast
unearned.desc: Oh my gosh, those Icons are so adorable! Don-chan and I gotta catch 'em all!

unearned.name: EXtra! EXtra!
unearned.desc: Battle requires courage! Train by using your EX Gauge to successfully land 100 EX Moves!

unearned.name: Super, Man!
unearned.desc: To battle is to win a fight with overwhelming strength! Show me you can do 100 Super Combos!

unearned.name: Ultra, Man!
unearned.desc: If yer gonna fight, give it your all, pal. Performing 100 Ultra Combos oughta do it, eh?

unearned.name: It Takes Focus
unearned.desc: Your mission, should you wish to join Delta Red, is to connect with 100 Focus Attacks!

unearned.name: Superior Super
unearned.desc: Trust your instincts and winning will come easy. Let's begin with 50 Super Combo finishes!

unearned.name: Ultimate Ultra
unearned.desc: Candy always says you gotta win with style, so go out there and perform 50 Ultra Combo finishes!

unearned.name: Sunspotter
unearned.desc: Amigo, perform 365 Super or Ultra Combo finishes against your opponents! The dawn is coming!

unearned.name: Absolute Perfection
unearned.desc: Lauren's waiting, so how about you finish your fights quickly and get 30 Perfects. Sound good?

unearned.name: Clear Headed
unearned.desc: Hey! Got time to kill? Try to clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher! That's all you gotta do!

unearned.name: All Clear
unearned.desc: To get strong takes lots of fighting! Clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher with all characters!

unearned.name: Herculean Effort
unearned.desc: Can you finish Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using a continue? Show me you can!

unearned.name: Hard Times
unearned.desc: To escape death is to beat the strongest of the strong. Finish Arcade Mode on Hardest, kid!

unearned.name: Long Time No See
unearned.desc: Do you wish for defeat? If so, complete Arcade Mode on Hardest difficulty and beat Gouken!

unearned.name: Rival Schooled
unearned.desc: See your future by clearing every Rival Battle on Medium or higher with every character.

unearned.name: Speed Freak
unearned.desc: Finish each round in Arcade Mode on Medium or higher in 20 seconds or less. Too easy.

unearned.name: Good Start
unearned.desc: All of nature must withstand a trial. You must clear 10 trials in Trial Mode to succeed.

unearned.name: Trail of Trials
unearned.desc: There is no shortcut in the art of Yoga. Aim to clear any character's Trial Mode trials!

unearned.name: Trial Athlete
unearned.desc: I shall assimilate all and be all-powerful! Clear all Trial Mode challenges, and so can you!

unearned.name: Oh! My Car!
unearned.desc: Hee hee, destruction is so much fun! Score 80,000 points or more in the Car Crusher bonus stage!

unearned.name: Barrel of Laughs
unearned.desc: No need for barrels without oil! Score 110,000 points or more in the Barrel Buster bonus stage!

unearned.name: It Begins
unearned.desc: The fight starts here! Set your Title and Icon, and begin fighting online!

unearned.name: Threepeat
unearned.desc: You think being this good is easy? Let's see you win 3 Ranked Matches in a row, champ!

unearned.name: Fivepeat
unearned.desc: This is your real power, child? Show me it's not luck by winning 5 Ranked Matches in a row!

unearned.name: Tenpeat
unearned.desc: Don't hold back your true potential! Win 10 Ranked Matches in a row!

unearned.name: Moving On Up
unearned.desc: Ya need to do anything to reach the top of the food chain! Let's see a Rank Up via Ranked Match!

unearned.name: Now You C Me...
unearned.desc: I wrestle only the strong! You shall rank up to C Rank if you wanna face me, comrade!

unearned.name: From C to Shining C
unearned.desc: You think you're good, don't you? Prove it by ranking up all characters to C Rank!

unearned.name: Road to Victory
unearned.desc: You wanna get that fight money? You're gonna have to win 10 matches online first, sucka!

unearned.name: Battle Master
unearned.desc: Only winners can attain such beauty. Win 30 matches online and I may share my beauty secrets.

unearned.name: Legendary Fighter
unearned.desc: I shall make you the right hand of Shadaloo if you can win 100 matches online!

unearned.name: Worldly Warrior
unearned.desc: Let's do this, amigo! Fight 50 matches online, because that's the only way to become strong!

unearned.name: Bring it on!
unearned.desc: No comrade, this will not do! We must become stronger, for our fans! Fight 100 matches online!

unearned.name: This is Madness!

unearned.name: Teamworker

unearned.name: Endless Ten

unearned.desc: Ascend beyond oneself by clearing Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using a continue with Oni.

unearned.name: Prep Time

unearned.desc: Assert leadership and clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using a continue with Rolento.

unearned.desc: Reach the league's top and clear Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using continue with Hugo.

unearned.name: A dish best served cold
unearned.desc: Follow your anger by clearing Arcade Mode on Medium or higher without using continue with Decapre.

unearned.name: Double Feature

earned.name: Cragclaw Defeated
earned.desc: Cragclaw down. Break out the garlic butter!

earned.name: Floopsnoot Queen Defeated
earned.desc: Successfully ended the bloodline of an endangered alien species! Congratulations!

earned.name: Teratomo Defeated
earned.desc: Teratomo is no mo'. Now go take a shower. You smell bad. Very bad.

earned.name: Open Seasame
earned.desc: Enter The Spire. I've got a bad feeling about this...

earned.name: Aaaaaaand we're back
earned.desc: You died! Now you're not dead! Huh. Weird!

earned.name: Phone Home
earned.desc: Play a video message from Kindred. Guess they didn't forget about us!

earned.name: Cannibals
earned.desc: Bait 5 creatures into attacking each other. Divide and conquer: Classic strat.

earned.name: Little Shop of Horrors
earned.desc: Fed 5 Pufferbirds to a Meat Vortex. Yes, it blends!

earned.name: The $600 Man
earned.desc: 3D-print all the 3D-printables. After that, go ahead and 3D-print yourself a gold star!

earned.name: Stronger, Faster, Probably Poisonous
earned.desc: Recklessly and irresponsibly eat every Orange Goo on AR-Y 26.

earned.name: Return To Sender
earned.desc: Retrieved your own loot box. Death is no excuse for leaving behind Kindred property!

earned.name: Ambidextrous
earned.desc: Use every left hand tool in the game. Gotta hand it to you: You're pretty handy.

earned.name: It's Not In The Game
earned.desc: Collect every obnoxious video ad on your computer.

earned.name: Your Friendly Neighbourhood...
earned.desc: Execute 10 consecutive grapples without touching the ground. You're like some kind of arachnid-man.

earned.name: For Science!
earned.desc: Complete the first set of Science Experiments. Science: It's not just for nerds!

earned.name: Deleted But Not Forgotten
earned.desc: Read all of the previous explorer's emails. Kinda nosy if you ask me.

earned.name: Teratomo? Teratomo!
earned.desc: Re-emerged onto AR-Y 26 after killing Teratomo. Back to work, I suppose!

earned.name: No Refunds
earned.desc: Finish the game in under 4 hours. See you at GDQ!

earned.name: Flippin' the bird
earned.desc: Get launched by a Pufferbird, then kill it.

earned.name: Turdball Wizard
earned.desc: Consecutively bounce on 5 different Springy Egg Sacs. It's like an ethically-iffy bouncy castle!

earned.name: That's all people really want to do...
earned.desc: Kick 10 Pufferbirds in 45 seconds. It's why you bought the game. We get it.

earned.name: Au-revoir Gopher!
earned.desc: Kill 5 Schnozos in 15 seconds. Moles ain't gonna whack themselves.

earned.name: Scott Norwood in the Hizzy...
earned.desc: Kick 25 Pufferbirds and 25 Maroons. It's ok. I don't know who Scott Norwood is either.

earned.name: What Would You Two Maniacs Like To Do First?

earned.name: He Slimed Me
earned.desc: Got covered in ooey-gooey alien guts.

earned.name: Don't Cross the Streams
earned.desc: Slapped your Co-Op partner. I'm sure you had a good reason for it.

earned.name: We came, We Saw, We Kicked Its Ass
earned.desc: Crack Cragclaw with a Co-Op partner. Teamwork really does make the dream work.

earned.name: A Little Help, Please
earned.desc: Revive your Co-Op partner. Let's hope they learn to start pulling their weight.

earned.name: Stop Crapping On Me, Jessie
earned.desc: Got pooped on by a Skipper. That's good luck, depending on who you ask. Not me. I think it's gross.

earned.name: Home At Last
earned.desc: You've returned home after fully completing your mission! You're a hero!

earned.name: Screw This Noise
